title: Naan Soodana Mogini Lyrics Paayum Puli 2015
stanzas:
variyaa maapula variyaa
variyaa maamane variyaa
enna thottu pottu pogaama
kattikittu pogathan

variyaa maapula variyaa
Ye variyaa maamane variyaa
Ye variyaa maapula variyaa
Variyaa machaane variyaa

koadi pazhamiruku
koyya thopula.
nee sodi pazham ketta
Niyamey illa.

samacha kari irukku
sandha kadayila.
nee samanja ponna ketta
niyamey illa.

sothezhuthi thanthaalum
vara maaten
kaththi vachu ketalum
thara maaten

parambaraiya koothu
padaichathu naanga
itha panangaasku vikka
mudiyaathu ponga (2)

ennai kadhalipor ayiram undu
ana enna katikida
nibanthana undu.

unakku vaakupada
enakku aasathaan
aana enaku muthal purusan
indha aatam thaan.

aambalaiku adupu ootha
vara maten
pulla pethu thaadina
thara maten

nibanthanaiku kattupattavuga vaanga
illa neettipadukka
veetukku veetukku ponga (2)

variyaa maapula variyaa
variyaa maamane variyaa
enna thottu pottu pogaama
kattikittu pogathan

variyaa maapula variyaa
Ye variyaa maamane variyaa
Ye variyaa maapula variyaa
Variyaa machaane variyaa

seo.title: Naan Soodana Mogini Lyrics Paayum Puli 2015
seo.description: Get the complete Naan Soodana Mogini Lyrics Paayum Puli 2015 from Paayum Puli. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by D Imman and sung by Jyoti Nooran. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Paayum Puli, D Imman, Jyoti Nooran, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
